item.title: BeerSmith2 RPM
item.description:
I’ve been trying to up my beer-making game, and remembered that I had a license to BeerSmith2, but didn’t see that they had any packages available for Fedora/Fedora remixes. So, I did a thing and have BeerSmith2 2.3.7 in RPM format.

Cheers,

Aaron
